sentence.Network_en: The Supreme Court unanimously reversed, denouncing the D. C . Circuit's opinion as " Monday morning quarterbacking. "
sentence.Network_cn: 最高法院一致推翻哥伦比亚 特区 法庭的裁决, 谴责其意见为 " 周一早晨的发号施令 ".

sentence.Network_en: Oh , yea , I'm sure soon I'll be quarterbacking every meeting and every project.
sentence.Network_cn: 你真的当真呐!还想主持所有会议,总管所有项目. 得啦,再见吧!
